text: yathā karṇaiḥ śrōṣyatha yūyaṁ vai kintu yūyaṁ na bhōtsyatha| nētrairdrakṣyatha yūyañca parijñātuṁ na śakṣyatha| tē mānuṣā yathā naiva paripaśyanti lōcanaiḥ| karṇai ryathā na śr̥ṇvanti na budhyantē ca mānasaiḥ| vyāvarttitēṣu cittēṣu kālē kutrāpi tairjanaiḥ| mattastē manujāḥ svasthā yathā naiva bhavanti ca| tathā tēṣāṁ manuṣyāṇāṁ kriyantē sthūlabuddhayaḥ| badhirībhūtakarṇāśca jātāśca mudritā dr̥śaḥ|
